pages.text: $(bgreen)Gold Magnet$() was on the fast track - corner office, full benefits, stock options. he was gonna be Vice President of Midwestern Operations. Now he's here, on this lawn, in serious danger of being eaten to death.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(bred)Assist$() plant that can $(bred)collect coin and jewel$() in 8 blocks for its owner.
